tvorwachs\ClouDNS\Api\ZonesApi::listZones

Gets a list with zones you have or zone names matching a keyword. The method works with pagination. Reverse zones are included.

    Signature

    public function listZones([integer $page = 1, [integer $rows = 10, [- $search = null]]] )

    Parameters

    $page — integer
    Current page your zone list is on


    $rows — integer
    Results per page. Can be 10, 20, 30, 50 or 100.


    $search — object
    Domain name, reverse zone name or keyword to search for in the zone names


    Returns

    array('Pages'
    'Data' => Array)
